data.template_text:
Create an Iterator containing a list of keys from the S3 bucket with the following args:
      bucket => [#P_BUCKET_NAME#]
    iterator => [#P_ITERATOR#]
      prefix => [#P_PREFIX#]

The Iterator will have the following keys
         KEY => The *entire* key of the S3 object
        PATH => The "directory" part of the key
        FILE => The "file" part of the key

This prevents the need to parse out these components from the key.
data.template_desc: Create an iterator from a list of objects in an S3 bucket. Access object paths via the OBJECT field in the generated iterator.

data.param_desc: The S3 bucket name to list objects in
The name of the iterator to generate
An optional prefix use to filter the list of keys
